Package com.cmas.controller

Class CampManager

java.lang.Object
com.cmas.controller.CampManager
public class CampManager extends Object
Controller class that manages all operations related to camps, including camp registration and withdrawal for both students and comm members, updating camp details, and generating reports.
Since:
2023-11-14

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final HashMap<UUID,Camp>
    campsData
    HashMap that stores camp data, where the keys are UUIDs and values are camps.

    • CampManager

      public CampManager()

  • Method Details

    • addNewCamp

      public static void addNewCamp(Camp camp, Staff staff)
      Adds a new camp to the system, generating a unique UUID for the camp. Tags the created camp with the provided staff.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to be added.
      staff - The staff in charge of the camp.

    • deleteCamp

      public static void deleteCamp(UUID campUID, Staff staff)

    • registerStudent

      public static void registerStudent(Student student, UUID campID) throws Exception
      Registers a student for a camp. Checks for registration deadlines, camp availability, withdrawal status.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to register.
      campID - The UUID of the camp to register for.
      Throws:
      Exception - If registration fails due to specific conditions.

    • registerCommMember

      public static void registerCommMember(Student student, UUID campID) throws Exception
      Registers a student as a camp committee member. Checks if current student is already a committee member and the current camp availability
      Parameters:
      student - The student to register as a committee member.
      campID - The UUID of the camp to register for.
      Throws:
      Exception - If registration fails due to specific conditions.

    • withdrawStudent

      public static void withdrawStudent(Student student, UUID campID) throws Exception
      Withdraws a student from a camp.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to withdraw from the camp.
      campID - The UUID of the camp from which the student is withdrawing.
      Throws:
      Exception - If withdrawal fails due to specific conditions.

    • getAllCamps

      public static HashMap<UUID,Camp> getAllCamps()
      Retrieves a HashMap containing all camps.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of camps, where keys are UUIDs and values are camps.

    • getCamp

      public static Camp getCamp(UUID campUID)
      Retrieves a specific camp based on the provided UUID.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of the camp to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The camp associated with the provided UUID.

    • getFilteredCamps

      public static HashMap<UUID,Camp> getFilteredCamps(Set<UUID> camps, IFilter filter)
      Retrieves all camps in faculty based on the provided faculty.
      Parameters:
      camps - The UUID of the set of camps.
      filter - The Filter that the user want to implement
      Returns:
      A HashMap of all camps in faculty, where keys are UUIDs and values are Camps.

    • getCampInFaculty

      public static HashMap<UUID,Camp> getCampInFaculty(UserGroup faculty)
      Retrieves all camps in faculty based on the provided faculty.
      Parameters:
      faculty - The UserGroup of the camp to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of all camps in faculty, where keys are UUIDs and values are Camps.

      public static Set<UUID> getCampSuggestions(UUID campUID)
      Retrieves all suggestions associated with the provided campID.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of the camp to retrieve suggestions.
      Returns:
      A Set of UUIDs of Suggestions.

      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of the camp.
      name - The string to update.

    • updateEnquiry

      public static void updateEnquiry(UUID campUID, UUID enquiryUID)
      Updates an enquiry for camp based on the provided UUID and the enquiryUID.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of the camp to update.
      enquiryUID - The UUID of the enquiry to add to the camp.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(UUID campUID, UUID enquiryUID)
      Deletes an enquiry for camp based on the provided UUID and the enquiryUID.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of the camp to update.
      enquiryUID - The UUID of the enquiry to remove from the camp.

    • updateSuggestion

      public static void updateSuggestion(UUID campUID, UUID suggestionUID)
      Updates a suggestion for camp based on the provided UUID and the suggestionUID.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of the camp to update.
      suggestionUID - The UUID of the suggestion to add to the camp.

    • removeSuggestionfromCamp

      public static void removeSuggestionfromCamp(UUID campUID, UUID suggestionUID)
      Removes a suggestion for camp based on the provided UUID and the suggestionUID.
      Parameters:
      campUID - The UUID of the camp to update.
      suggestionUID - The UUID of the suggestion to remove from the camp.

    • hasClashingDates

      public static boolean hasClashingDates(Student student, UUID campUID)
      Checks if date clashes between a new camp and existing camps registered by a student, preventing student from registering with camps that have clashing dates.
      Parameters:
      student - The student for whom to check date clashes.
      campUID - The UUID of the new camp.
      Returns:
      True if there is a date clash, false otherwise.

    • generateReport

      public static void generateReport(UUID campID, int filter) throws IOException
      Generates a report for a specific camp based on the specified filter. The report includes details such as camp name, description, start date, end date, total slots, user group, and staff in charge. Specified filters include filtering based on student roles (Attendees / Camp Comm Members)
      Parameters:
      campID - The UUID of the camp for which to generate the report.
      filter - The filter indicating which information to include in the report (0 for all, 1 for attendees, 2 for committee members).
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while writing the report to a file.

    • generatePerformanceReport

      public static void generatePerformanceReport() throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception
